Description: * {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} T2 damage decreased from +75 to +60
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Return to Shadows}} cooldown increased from 90s to 100s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Return to Shadows}} speed reduced from +50% to +30%
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Return to Shadows}} T2 now also grants +20% speed
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} cooldown between charges increased from 2s to 3.5s
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} T2 damage reduced from +100 to +80
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: Bullet Damage reduced by 15%
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: Bullet velocity increased from 86 to 340
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Spectral Assistant}} now has new VFX

* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} targeting mechanism has been reworked. It is now an AoE target ability in the base. It has a 0.7s delay before the area is affected. Cast range increased from 20m to 30m, Movespeed reduced from 35% to 15% and cooldown reduced from 45s to 35s.
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} now has new VFX
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Audience Participation}} range increased from 10m to 20m
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Audience Participation}} copy duration decreased from 20s to 10s
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: Various new and improved SFX
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Card Trick}} base radius reduced from 5m to 4m
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Telekinesis}} base damage reduced from 175 to 140
* Ammo Scavenger: Max Stacks reduced from 20 to 18
* Ammo Scavenger: No longer grants +40 health
* Extra Stamina: No longer grants +4% Fire Rate
* Restorative Shot: No longer grants +3% Weapon Damage
